member.name: M:Waher.Script.Graphs3D.Canvas3D.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary:
3D drawing area.
By default, the camera is looking along the z-axis, with no projection, and no scaling. The center of the canvas is located at origo.
member.param: Number of subpixels for each generated pixel. Oversampling provides a means to achieve anti-aliasing in the rendered result.

member.summary: Creates a bitmap from the pixels in the canvas.

member.param: Distance between near projection plane and camera.

member.name: M:Waher.Script.Graphs3D.Canvas3D.Polygon(System.Numerics.Vector4[],SkiaSharp.SKColor,System.Boolean)
member.param: If the polygon is two-sided. If true, is used on both sides. If false, is only used on the front side. Which side is the front side, is determined from the Normal vector and viewing position. The Normal vector is determined from the order of the nodes defining the polygon.

member.param: If the polygon is two-sided. If true, is used on both sides. If false, is only used on the front side. Which side is the front side, is determined from the Normal vector and viewing position. The Normal vector is determined from the order of the nodes defining the polygon.

member.summary: Draws a set of closed polygons. Interior polygons can be used to undraw the corresponding sections.
member.param: If the polygon is two-sided. If true, is used on both sides. If false, is only used on the front side. Which side is the front side, is determined from the Normal vector and viewing position. The Normal vector is determined from the order of the nodes defining the polygon.

member.param: Ratio of reflection of the ambient term present in all points in the scene rendered.
Ratio of reflection of the diffuse term of incoming light.
Ratio of reflection of the specular term of incoming light.
Larger for surfaces that are smoother and more mirror-like.
Length of expression covered by node.
Ratio of reflection of the ambient term present in all points in the scene rendered, front side.
Ratio of reflection of the diffuse term of incoming light, front side.
Ratio of reflection of the specular term of incoming light, front side.
Larger for surfaces that are smoother and more mirror-like, front side.
Ratio of reflection of the ambient term present in all points in the scene rendered, back side.
Ratio of reflection of the diffuse term of incoming light, back side.
Ratio of reflection of the specular term of incoming light, back side.
Larger for surfaces that are smoother and more mirror-like, back side.
Length of expression covered by node.
